mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize image sizes and use responsive design frameworks for faster load times on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the number of large images and optimize the code to improve page load speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Include more relevant keywords in the meta tags and alt text for images to improve search engine rankings.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the navigation and ensure that all essential information is easily accessible.
tips: Improve mobile load times by reducing file sizes.
